body.transcript:
Hello! Welcome to Star Tunes Music School. My name is Johnny Phillips. How can I assist you today?

Hi Johnny! I'm really excited to learn more about your music classes. My name is Mary Walker.

It's great to meet you, Mary! We offer a variety of classes. Are you interested in any particular instrument?

I'm interested in piano lessons. Can you tell me about the pricing?

Of course! Our beginner piano classes are ninety nine dollars per month. We also offer a ten percent discount if you sign up for six months.

Wow, that sounds great! What do I need to do to enroll?

I just need a couple of details from you. Could you please provide me with your email address?

Sure, it's mary.walker@example.com.

Thank you, Mary. Can I also have your phone number for our records?

Yes, it's five five five - one two three - four five six seven.

Perfect, thank you. I'll send you all the necessary information to your email. We look forward to having you in our classes!

I'm really excited to start. Thank you for your help, Johnny!

You're welcome, Mary! Thank you for taking the time to reach out to us. Have a wonderful day!
